definition[0]: relating to the power of the human mind to do strange or surprising things that cannot be explained by reason
example[0]: a spiritual healer with psychic powers
definition[1]: someone who is psychic has the ability to know what other people are thinking or what will happen in the future
example[2]: You donâ€™t have to be psychic to know what Maggie is thinking.
definition[2]: affecting the mind rather than the body
definition[3]: someone who has mysterious powers, especially the ability to receive messages from dead people or to know what will happen in the future
